content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price was 850 euros per month.
name: Evaluator

content: I'm sorry, but the final price cannot be 850 euros per month. Please provide the correct final price.
name: Evaluator
